src_original: Wal_3.34.1 santi satvāḥ pratyupasthitakāmā ye pratyupasthitaiḥ kāmair aiśvaryaṁ vaśe vartayanti tadyathā manuṣyā ekatyaś ca devāḥ / iyaṁ prathamā kāmopapattiḥ /
Wal_3.34.2 santi satvā nirmitakāmā ye nirmiya nirmiya kāmair aiśvaryaṁ vaśe vartayanti tadyathā devā nirmāṇaratayaḥ / iyaṁ dvitīyā kāmopapattiḥ /
Wal_3.35.1.a santi satvāḥ ya imam eva kāyaṁ vivekajena prītisukhenābhiṣyandayanti pariṣyandayanti
pariprīṇayanti parispharanti / nāsty eṣāṁ kiñcit sarvataḥ kāyād asphuṭaṁ bhavati
spharaṇīyaṁ yaduta vivekajena prītisukhena / Wal_3.35.1.b te tena sukhena tena saumanasyena dīrghāyuṣo dīrgham adhvānaṁ tiṣṭhanti tadyathā devā brahmakāyikāḥ / iyaṁ prathamā sukhopapattiḥ /
Wal_3.35.2.a santi satvā ya imam eva kāyaṁ samādhijena prītisukhenābhiṣyandayanti pariṣyandayanti
pariprīṇayanti parispharanti / nāsty eṣāṁ kiñcit sarvataḥ kāyād asphuṭaṁ bhavati
spharaṇīyaṁ yaduta samādhijena prītisukhena / Wal_3.35.2.b te tena sukhena tena saumanasyena dīrghāyuṣo dīrgham adhvānaṁ tiṣṭhanti tadyathā devā ābhāsvarāḥ / iyaṁ dvitiyā sukhopapattiḥ /

Wal_3.35.3.a santi satvā ya imam eva kāyaṁ niṣprītikena sukhenābhiṣyandayanti pariṣyandayanti pariprīṇayanti parispharanti / nāsty eṣāṁ kiñcit sarvataḥ kāyād asphuṭaṁ bhavati spharaṇīyaṁ yaduta niṣprītikena sukhena /
Wal_3.35.3.b te tena sukhena tena saumanasyena dīrghāyuṣo dīrgham adhvānaṁ tiṣṭhanti tadyathā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ / iyaṁ tṛitīyā sukhopapattiḥ /
